    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82377</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Etoiles à neutrons</string>
            <string language="en">Neutron stars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutronsterne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrelas de nêutron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stelle di neutrone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστέρια νετρονίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estrellas de neutrón</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre comment un neutron  tiennent le premier rôle est produit à partir d'un massif tiennent le premier rôle  comme le géant rouge après une explosion de supernova.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a neutron star is produced from a massive star like the red giant after a supernova explosion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'explosion</string>
            <string language="en">explosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoiles massive</string>
            <string language="en">massive stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile à neutrons</string>
            <string language="en">neutron star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">géant rouge</string>
            <string language="en">red giant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">supernova</string>
            <string language="en">supernova</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Neutronstern aus 
einem massiven Stern wie dem roten Riesen nach einer 
Supernovaexplosion produziert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como uma estrela de 
nêutron é produzida de uma estrela maciça como o gigante vermelho 
após uma explosão do supernova.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come una stella di 
neutrone è prodotta da una stella voluminosa come il gigante rosso 
dopo un'esplosione del supernova.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ένα αστέρι 
νετρονίων παράγεται από ένα ογκώδες αστέρι όπως τον κόκκινο 
γίγαντα μετά από μια έκρηξη σουπερνοβών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo una estrella de 
neutrón se produce de una estrella masiva como el gigante rojo 
después de una explosión de la supernova.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Explosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">massive Sterne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutronstern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">roter Riese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Supernova</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrela de nêutron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gigante vermelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">supernova</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
